TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignedXml extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供核心 XML 簽章物件的包裝函式，以利建立 XML 簽章。

span.span: Provides a wrapper on a core XML signature object to facilitate creating XML signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 的.NET Framework 實作[XML 簽章語法和處理規格](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)，也稱為 XMLDSIG （XML 數位簽章）。The class is the .NET Framework implementation of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/), also known as XMLDSIG (XML Digital Signature). XMLDSIG 是標準為基礎、 可互通的方式，來簽署與驗證所有或部分的 XML 文件或其他資料的可定址的統一資源識別元 (URI)。XMLDSIG is a standards-based, interoperable way to sign and verify all or part of an XML document or other data that is addressable from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 使用類別，每當您需要共用以標準方式簽署應用程式或組織之間的 XML 資料。Use the class whenever you need to share signed XML data between applications or organizations in a standard way. 使用這個類別簽章的任何資料可由任何合格 XMLDSIG W3C 規格實作驗證。Any data signed using this class can be verified by any conforming implementation of the W3C specification for XMLDSIG. 類別可讓您建立 XML 數位簽章的下列三種：The class allows you to create the following three kinds of XML digital signatures: |簽章類型Signature Type|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |包裹的簽章Enveloped signature|簽章會包含在要簽署的 XML 項目。The signature is contained within the XML element being signed.| |包裹的簽章Enveloping signature|簽署的 XML 包含在 <`Signature`> 項目。The signed XML is contained within the <`Signature`> element.| |內部已卸離的簽章Internal detached signature|簽章與簽署的 XML 在相同的文件，但沒有項目包含的其他。The signature and signed XML are in the same document, but neither element contains the other.| 另外還有第四種稱為外部的已卸離簽章時，資料與簽章是在個別的 XML 文件的簽章。There is also a fourth kind of signature called an external detached signature which is when the data and signature are in separate XML documents. 不支援外部卸離的簽章類別。External detached signatures are not supported by the class. ## XML 簽章的結構The structure of an XML Signature 建立 XMLDSIG <`Signature`> 元素，其中包含數位簽章的 XML 文件或其他資料的可定址的 URI。XMLDSIG creates a <`Signature`> element, which contains a digital signature of an XML document or other data that is addressable from a URI. <`Signature`> 項目可選擇性地包含有關在哪裡尋找將會驗證簽章金鑰和用於簽章的密碼編譯演算法。The <`Signature`> element can optionally contain information about where to find a key that will verify the signature and which cryptographic algorithm was used for signing. 基本結構如下所示：The basic structure is as follows: ```xml Base64EncodedValue== AnotherBase64EncodedValue=== ``` 此結構的主要部分包括：The main parts of this structure are: <`CanonicalizationMethod`> 項目The <`CanonicalizationMethod`> element 指定規則重寫`Signature`從 XML/文字項目為簽章驗證的位元組。Specifies the rules for rewriting the `Signature` element from XML/text into bytes for signature validation. .NET Framework 中的預設值是http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315，其可識別值得信任的演算法。The default value in the .NET Framework is http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315, which identifies a trustworthy algorithm. 這個項目由屬性。This element is represented by the property. <`SignatureMethod`> 項目The <`SignatureMethod`> element 指定用來簽章產生和驗證，並已套用至演算法 <`Signature`> 產生的值中的項目 <`SignatureValue`>。Specifies the algorithm used for signature generation and validation, which was applied to the <`Signature`> element to produce the value in <`SignatureValue`>. 在範例中的值之上http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1識別 RSA PKCS1 sha-1 簽章。In the example above, the value http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1 identifies an RSA PKCS1 SHA-1 signature. 這個項目由屬性。This element is represented by the property. <`SignatureValue`> 項目The <`SignatureValue`> element 指定的密碼編譯簽章 <`Signature`> 項目。Specifies the cryptographic signature for the <`Signature`> element. 如果此簽章不會驗證，然後的某些部分 <`Signature`> 區塊已遭竄改，而且文件都被視為無效。If this signature does not verify, then some portion of the <`Signature`> block was tampered with, and the document is considered invalid. 只要 <`CanonicalizationMethod`> 值是值得信任，這個值是高抵抗遭到竄改。As long as the <`CanonicalizationMethod`> value is trustworthy, this value is highly resistant to tampering. 這個項目由屬性。This element is represented by the property. `URI`屬性 <`Reference`> 項目The `URI` attribute of the <`Reference`> element 指定資料物件，使用 URI 參考。Specifies a data object using a URI reference. 這個屬性由屬性。This attribute is represented by the property. - 未指定`URI`屬性，也就是設定屬性`null`，表示，接收應用程式應知道的物件識別。Not specifying the `URI` attribute, that is, setting the property to `null`, means that the receiving application is expected to know the identity of the object. 在大部分情況下， `null` URI 會導致擲回例外狀況。In most cases, a `null` URI will result in an exception being thrown. 請勿使用`null`URI，除非您的應用程式與它需要的通訊協定互通。Do not use a `null` URI, unless your application is interoperating with a protocol which requires it. - 設定`URI`屬性設為空字串表示，要簽署的文件的根項目，一種包裹簽章。Setting the `URI` attribute to an empty string indicates that the root element of the document is being signed, a form of enveloped signature. - 如果值`URI`屬性開頭為 #，則值必須解析為目前的文件中的項目。If the value of `URI` attribute starts with #, then the value must resolve to an element in the current document. 此表單後可以搭配任何支援的簽章類型 （信封簽章、 封裝簽章或內部已卸離的簽章）。This form can be used with any of the supported signature types (enveloped signature, enveloping signature or internal detached signature). - 任何其他項目會被視為卸離的外部資源簽章，並不支援類別。Anything else is considered an external resource detached signature and is not supported by the class. <`Transforms`> 項目The <`Transforms`> element 包含的已排序的清單 <`Transform`> 描述如何簽署者取得的資料物件的項目一。Contains an ordered list of <`Transform`> elements that describe how the signer obtained the data object that was digested. 轉換演算法是類似的規範化方法，但不重寫 <`Signature`> 它重寫的識別內容項目，`URI`屬性 <`Reference`> 項目。A transform algorithm is similar to the canonicalization method, but instead of rewriting the <`Signature`> element, it rewrites the content identified by the `URI` attribute of the <`Reference`> element. <`Transforms`> 項目由類別。The <`Transforms`> element is represented by the class. - 每個轉換演算法被定義為 XML (XPath 節點集) 或位元組做為輸入。Each transform algorithm is defined as taking either XML (an XPath node-set) or bytes as input. 如果目前的資料格式不同於轉換的輸入需求，則會套用轉換規則。If the format of the current data differs from the transform input requirements, conversion rules are applied. - 每個轉換演算法會定義為做為輸出中產生 XML 或位元組。Each transform algorithm is defined as producing either XML or bytes as the output. - 如果未定義上次轉換演算法的輸出以位元組為單位 （或未指定任何轉換），然後規範化方法http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315做為隱含的轉換 (即使使用不同的演算法中指定了 <`CanonicalizationMethod`>項目）。If the output of the last transform algorithm is not defined in bytes (or no transforms were specified), then the canonicalization method http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315 is used as an implicit transform (even if a different algorithm was specified in the <`CanonicalizationMethod`> element). - 值為http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature轉換演算法會將編碼的規則，會解譯為移除 <`Signature`> 文件中的項目。A value of http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature for the transform algorithm encodes a rule which is interpreted as remove the <`Signature`> element from the document. 否則，信封的簽章的驗證器會摘要文件，包括簽章，但簽署人會有一文件之前套用簽章，導致不同的答案。Otherwise, a verifier of an enveloped signature will digest the document, including the signature, but the signer would have digested the document before the signature was applied, leading to different answers. <`DigestMethod`> 項目The <`DigestMethod`> element 識別摘要 （密碼編譯雜湊） 要套用的方法上轉換的內容，由`URI`屬性 <`Reference`> 項目。Identifies the digest (cryptographic hash) method to apply on the transformed content identified by the `URI` attribute of the <`Reference`> element. 這由屬性。This is represented by the property. ## 選擇規範化方法Choosing a canonicalization method 除非需要使用不同值的規格與互通，我們建議您使用預設的規範化方法，這是 XML C14N 1.0 演算法，其值是.NET Framework 中http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315。Unless interoperating with a specification which requires the use of a different value, we recommend that you use the default canonicalization method in the .NET Framework which is the XML-C14N 1.0 algorithm, whose value is http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315. 特別是因為最終的隱含轉換，來套用 XML C14N 1.0 演算法需要 XMLDSIG 的所有實作必須支援。The XML-C14N 1.0 algorithm is required to be supported by all implementations of XMLDSIG, particularly as it is an implicit final transform to apply. 有標準化演算法支援保留註解的版本。There are versions of canonicalization algorithms which support preserving comments. 保留註解的規範化方法不會建議因為違反 「 看到登入 」 的原則。Comment-preserving canonicalization methods are not recommended because they violate the "sign what is seen" principle. 也就是中的註解 <`Signature`> 項目並不會更改，處理邏輯的簽章的執行方式，只是哪些簽章值為。That is, the comments in a <`Signature`> element will not alter the processing logic for how the signature is performed, merely what the signature value is. 結合的弱式的簽章演算法，讓攻擊者不必要的自由強制雜湊衝突，是包含可提供的註解時讓看起來像是合法遭竄改的文件。When combined with a weak signature algorithm, allowing the comments to be included gives an attacker unnecessary freedom to force a hash collision, making a tampered document appear legitimate. 在.NET Framework 中，內建 canonicalizers 只支援預設。In the .NET Framework, only built-in canonicalizers are supported by default. 若要支援其他或自訂 canonicalizers，請參閱屬性。To support additional or custom canonicalizers, see the property. 如果文件使用不在集合所代表的規範化方法屬性，則方法會傳回`false`。If the document uses a canonicalization method that is not in the collection represented by the property, then the method will return `false`. > [!NOTE] > 極防禦應用程式可以移除不會預期要從使用簽署人的任何值集合。An extremely defensive application can remove any values it does not expect signers to use from the collection. ## 會參考值不受竄改安全嗎？Are the Reference values safe from tampering? 是，<`Reference`> 的值為安全，防止遭到竄改。Yes, the <`Reference`> values are safe from tampering. .NET framework 會確認 <`SignatureValue`> 計算之前處理的任何 <`Reference`> 值和其相關聯轉換，並將中止早期以避免潛在的惡意的處理指示。The .NET framework verifies the <`SignatureValue`> computation before processing any of the <`Reference`> values and their associated transforms, and will abort early to avoid potentially malicious processing instructions. ## 選擇要簽署項目Choosing the elements to sign 我們建議您使用的值""的`URI`屬性 (或設定屬性設為空字串)，如果可能的話。We recommend that you use the value of "" for the `URI` attribute (or set the property to an empty string), if possible. 這表示摘要計算，這表示整份文件會保護不受竄改，就會考慮整份文件。This means the whole document is considered for the digest computation, which means the whole document is protected from tampering. 它是很常見，請參閱`URI`錨點，例如 #foo，其 ID 屬性為"foo"項目表單中的值。It is very common to see `URI` values in the form of anchors such as #foo, referring to an element whose ID attribute is "foo". 不幸的是，很容易被竄改，因為這樣會包含目標項目，而不是內容的內容。Unfortunately, it is easy for this to be tampered with because this includes only the content of the target element, not the context. 濫用區別這兩者即為 XML 簽章包裝 (XSW)。Abusing this distinction is known as XML Signature Wrapping (XSW). 如果您的應用程式會認為是語意的註解 （這不常見時處理 XML），則應該使用 「 #xpointer(/)"而不是""，和 「 #xpointer(id('foo'))"而不是"#foo"。If your application considers comments to be semantic (which is not common when dealing with XML), then you should use "#xpointer(/)" instead of "", and "#xpointer(id('foo'))" instead of "#foo". #Xpointer 版本都會解譯為包括註解，雖然 shortname 表單不會包括註解。The #xpointer versions are interpreted as including comments, while the shortname forms are excluding comments. 如果您需要接受僅部分受保護的文件，而且您想要確保您正在閱讀的相同的內容保護簽章，請使用方法。If you need to accept documents which are only partially protected and you want to ensure that you are reading the same content that the signature protected, use the method. ## KeyInfo 項目相關的安全性考量Security considerations about the KeyInfo element 選擇性的資料 <`KeyInfo`> 項目 (也就是屬性)，其中包含的索引鍵來驗證簽章，不應該信任。The data in the optional <`KeyInfo`> element (that is, the property), which contains a key to validate the signature, should not be trusted. 特別是當值代表裸機 RSA、 DSA 或 ECDSA 公開金鑰，文件可能已遭竄改，儘管reporting 簽章是否有效的方法。In particular, when the value represents a bare RSA, DSA or ECDSA public key, the document could have been tampered with, despite the method reporting that the signature is valid. 這可能是因為實體進行竄改只對產生新的金鑰和重新簽署遭竄改的文件，該新的索引鍵。This can happen because the entity doing the tampering just has to generate a new key and re-sign the tampered document with that new key. 因此，除非您的應用程式會驗證的公開金鑰是預期的值，如同它已遭竄改，應該為其文件。So, unless your application verifies that the public key is an expected value, the document should be treated as if it were tampered with. 這需要您的應用程式檢查內嵌在文件的公開金鑰，並確認針對一份文件內容的已知值。This requires that your application examine the public key embedded within the document and verify it against a list of known values for the document context. 比方說，如果文件無法瞭解的已知使用者發行，您會檢查與該使用者所使用的已知索引鍵清單的索引鍵。For example, if the document could be understood to be issued by a known user, you'd check the key against a list of known keys used by that user. 您也可以在使用中處理文件之後驗證金鑰方法，而不是使用方法。You can also verify the key after processing the document by using the method, instead of using the method. 但是，為了取得最佳安全性，您應該事先確認索引鍵。But, for the optimal security, you should verify the key beforehand. 或者，請考慮嘗試使用者的已註冊的公開金鑰，而不是讀取功能的 <`KeyInfo`> 項目。Alternately, consider trying the user's registered public keys, rather than reading what's in the <`KeyInfo`> element. ## X509Data 項目相關的安全性考量Security considerations about the X509Data element 選擇性 <`X509Data`> 元素是子系 <`KeyInfo`> 項目與包含一或多個 X509 憑證或識別項的 X509 憑證。The optional <`X509Data`> element is a child of the <`KeyInfo`> element and contains one or more X509 certificates or identifiers for X509 certificates. 中的資料 <`X509Data`> 項目也不能本質上受到信任。The data in the <`X509Data`> element should also not be inherently trusted. 確認內嵌在文件時 <`X509Data`> 項目，.NET Framework 只會確認資料解析 x509 憑證的公開金鑰可以成功地用來驗證文件簽章。When verifying a document with the embedded <`X509Data`> element, the .NET Framework verifies only that the data resolves to an X509 certificate whose public key can be successfully used to validate the document signature. 不同於呼叫方法`verifySignatureOnly`參數設定為`false`、 無撤銷檢查，勾選沒有鏈結信任，並確認沒有到期。Unlike calling the method with the `verifySignatureOnly` parameter set to `false`, no revocation check is performed, no chain trust is checked, and no expiration is verified. 即使您的應用程式會擷取憑證本身，並將其傳遞給方法`verifySignatureOnly`參數設定為`false`，也就是仍不足夠，以防遭到竄改的文件的驗證。Even if your application extracts the certificate itself and passes it to the method with the `verifySignatureOnly` parameter set to `false`, that is still not sufficient validation to prevent document tampering. 要驗證為適用於所簽署的文件仍然需要憑證。The certificate still needs to be verified as being appropriate for the document being signed. 使用內嵌的簽章憑證可提供有用的金鑰更換策略是否在 <`X509Data`> 區段或文件內容中。Using an embedded signing certificate can provide useful key rotation strategies, whether in the <`X509Data`> section or in the document content. 使用這個方式時應用程式應該手動擷取憑證，並執行驗證類似於：When using this approach an application should extract the certificate manually and perform validation similar to: - 憑證已發出直接或透過鏈結由憑證授權單位 (CA) 的公開憑證會內嵌在應用程式。The certificate was issued directly or via a chain by a Certificate Authority (CA) whose public certificate is embedded in the application. 使用作業系統提供的信任清單，而不需額外檢查，例如已知的主體名稱，並不足以防止竄改中。Using the OS-provided trust list without additional checks, such as a known subject name, is not sufficient to prevent tampering in . - 對憑證進行確認要在文件簽署時已過期 （或 「 現在 」 的近即時的文件處理）。The certificate is verified to have not been expired at the time of document signing (or "now" for near real-time document processing). - 對於長時間執行可支援撤銷 CA 所簽發的憑證，請確認憑證未被撤銷。For long-lived certificates issued by a CA which supports revocation, verify the certificate was not revoked. - 憑證主體會被驗證為正在適用於目前文件。The certificate subject is verified as being appropriate to the current document. ## 選擇轉換演算法Choosing the transform algorithm 如果您進行交互操作的已指定特定值 （例如 XrML) 規格，您需要遵循的規格。If you are interoperating with a specification which has dictated specific values (such as XrML), then you need to follow the specification. 如果您有包裹的簽章 (例如當簽署整份文件)，則您需要使用http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature(由類別)。If you have an enveloped signature (such as when signing the whole document), then you need to use http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature (represented by the class). 您可以指定隱含 XML C14N 轉換，但不需要。You can specify the implicit XML-C14N transform as well, but it's not necessary. 包裹或已卸離的簽章，不不需要任何轉換。For an enveloping or detached signature, no transforms are required. 隱含的 XML C14N 轉換會負責所有項目。The implicit XML-C14N transform takes care of everything. 使用更新的安全性所導入[Microsoft 安全性公告 MS16-035](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/security/ms16-035.aspx)，.NET Framework 已限制轉換可以是用於驗證文件依預設，使用不受信任的轉換造成永遠傳回`false`。With the security updated introduced by the [Microsoft Security Bulletin MS16-035](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/security/ms16-035.aspx), the .NET Framework has restricted what transforms can be used in document verification by default, with untrusted transforms causing to always return `false`. 特別是，需要額外的輸入 （指定為 XML 中的子元素） 的轉換不再允許由於其造成機率不當使用的惡意使用者。In particular, transforms which require additional input (specified as child elements in the XML) are no longer allowed due to their susceptibility of abuse by malicious users. W3C 建議避免使用 XPath 和 XSLT 轉換，也就是受到這些限制的兩個主要的轉換。The W3C advises avoiding the XPath and XSLT transforms, which are the two main transforms affected by these restrictions. ## 使用外部參考的問題The problem with external references 如果應用程式不會驗證外部參考似乎是適用於目前的內容，它們可能遭濫用提供許多安全性漏洞 （包括阻絕服務，分散式反映阻絕服務，資訊的方式洩漏、 簽章許可和遠端執行程式碼）。If an application does not verify that external references seem appropriate for the current context, they can be abused in ways that provide for many security vulnerabilities (including Denial of Service, Distributed Reflection Denial of Service, Information Disclosure, Signature Bypass, and Remote Code Execution). 即使應用程式來驗證外部參考 URI，而保持兩次載入的資源問題： 當您的應用程式讀取它，一旦另一次當讀取它。Even if an application were to validate the external reference URI, there would remain a problem of the resource being loaded twice: once when your application reads it, and once when reads it. 並不保證應用程式讀取和文件驗證步驟具有相同的內容，因為簽章不提供可信度。Since there’s no guarantee that the application read and document verify steps have the same content, the signature does not provide trustworthiness. 指定的外部參考，風險遇到外部參考時將會擲回例外狀況。Given the risks of external references, will throw an exception when an external reference is encountered. 如需有關此問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[知識庫文章 3148821](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/3148821)。For more information about this issue, see [KB article 3148821](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/3148821). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何登入，並確認使用信封的簽章的整個 XML 文件。The following code example shows how to sign and verify an entire XML document using an enveloped signature. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也會計算參考的摘要和簽章的值。This method also computes the digest of the references and the value of the signature. 如果使用 X.509 簽章簽署 XML 文件方法會搜尋適用於驗證憑證的 「 通訊錄 」 存放區。If an XML document was signed with an X.509 signature, the method will search the "AddressBook" store for certificates suitable for the verification. 例如，如果憑證參考的主體金鑰識別碼 (SKI)，方法將會選取與此 SKI 憑證，然後再次嘗試它們一個接著一個直到它可以驗證的憑證。For example, if the certificate is referenced by a Subject Key Identifier (SKI), the method will select certificates with this SKI and try them one after another until it can verify the certificate. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何登入，並確認使用信封的簽章的整個 XML 文件。The following code example shows how to sign and verify an entire XML document using an enveloped signature. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示 <`Signature`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章使用屬性中所包含的物件。The property represents the <`Signature`> element of an XML digital signature using a object contained within the property. <`Signature`> 項目是用於 XML 數位簽章建立及驗證的根元素。The <`Signature`> element is the root element used for XML digital signature creation and verification. 使用屬性，以擷取物件所使用物件。Use the property to retrieve the object used by the object. 如需有關``項目，請參閱位於 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ XMLDSIG 規格。For more information about the `` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來簽署與驗證使用信封的簽章的整個 XML 文件。The following code example uses the property to sign and verify an entire XML document using an enveloped signature. summary.span: 取得在驗證 XML 簽章格式 (不是密碼編譯安全性) 時呼叫的委派。

span.span: Gets a delegate that will be called to validate the format (not the cryptographic security) of an XML signature.

value.span: 如果是可接受的格式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the format is acceptable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來確保，會使用特定的轉換，或簽章會使用特定的雜湊演算法和等等。This method can be used to ensure that only certain transforms are used, or that the signature uses a certain hash algorithm, and so on. 將屬性設定為`null`移除所有簽章格式驗證從物件。Setting the property to `null` removes all signature format validation from the object. 您也可以讀取物件的目前委派和鏈結，如果您想要。You can also read the object's current delegate and chain to it if you want. 如果您要設定的格式驗證程式，做為輸入參數，將會收到您提供的委派物件正在驗證，並傳回布林值 –`true`格式可接受的如果`false`如果不是。If you are setting up a format validator, the delegate you supply will receive as an input parameter the object being verified and returns a Boolean value – `true` if the format is acceptable, `false` if it is not. 如果在委派傳回`false`基於任何理由，物件會報告 XML 簽章無效。If the delegate returns `false` for any reason, the object will report that the XML signature is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示 <`SignatureMethod`> XML 數位簽章使用統一資源識別元 (URI) 字串屬性中所包含的項目。The property represents the <`SignatureMethod`> element of an XML digital signature using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) string contained within the property. <`SignatureMethod`> 元素是元素的子元素 <`SignedInfo`> 項目。The <`SignatureMethod`> element is a subelement of the <`SignedInfo`> element. 使用屬性來擷取 <`SignatureMethod`> 所使用的 URI物件。Use the property to retrieve the <`SignatureMethod`> URI used by the object. 這是一個唯讀的屬性。This property is read only. 如需有關以程式設計方式指定的 URI <`SignatureMethod`> 項目，請參閱屬性。For more information about programmatically specifying a URI for the <`SignatureMethod`> element, see the property. 如需有關``項目，請參閱位於 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ XMLDSIG 規格。For more information about the `` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
